result.eng: They protected me from the cold.
result.ga: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht mé
result.orig: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht mé
result.html: Chosain siad roimh an fhuacht méThey protected me from the cold.
result.ponchtml: Ċosain siad roiṁ an ḟuaċt méThey protected me from the cold.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ga: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.orig: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán te
result.html: Fuair siad faoiseamh ón bhfuacht nuair a chuir siad a lámha timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.
result.ponchtml: Fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.html: Tá fuacht ormI feel cold.
result.ponchtml: Tá fuaċt ormI feel cold.

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.orig: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.html: Cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ponchtml: Cé nár ṫiteamar amaċ le ċéile ar fad ṫáinig fuaċt ar an gcairdeasAlthough we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.

result.eng: His teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ga: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.orig: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.html: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuachtHis teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ċár á ġreadaḋ ar a ċéile le fuaċtHis teeth were chattering from cold.
